005
006package dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.selection;
007
008import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
010
011import java.util.EnumSet;
012import java.util.stream.Collectors;
013
014import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
015import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
016import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
017import dev.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.OscalModelConstants;
019import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.BackMatter;
020import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.BackMatter.Resource;
021import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Catalog;
022import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.CatalogGroup;
023import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Control;
024import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.ControlPart;
025import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Metadata;
026import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Metadata.Location;
027import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Metadata.Party;
028import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Metadata.Role;
029import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.Parameter;
030import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.support.AbstractCatalogEntityVisitor;
031import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.support.IEntityItem;
032import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.support.IEntityItem.ItemType;
033import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.support.IIndexer;
034import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.support.IIndexer.SelectionStatus;
035import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
036import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
037
038public class FilterNonSelectedVisitor
039    extends AbstractCatalogEntityVisitor<FilterNonSelectedVisitor.Context, DefaultResult> {
040  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(FilterNonSelectedVisitor.class);
041  @NonNull
042  private static final FilterNonSelectedVisitor SINGLETON = new FilterNonSelectedVisitor();
043
044  @NonNull
045  @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "SING_SINGLETON_GETTER_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED", justification = "class initialization")
046  public static FilterNonSelectedVisitor instance() {
047    return SINGLETON;
048  }
049
050  @SuppressWarnings("null")
051
052  @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "SING_SINGLETON_HAS_NONPRIVATE_CONSTRUCTOR", justification = "allows for extension")
053  protected FilterNonSelectedVisitor() {
054    // all other entity types are handled in a special way by this visitor
055    super(EnumSet.of(IEntityItem.ItemType.GROUP, IEntityItem.ItemType.CONTROL, IEntityItem.ItemType.PARAMETER));
056  }
057
058  public void visitCatalog(@NonNull IDocumentNodeItem catalogItem, @NonNull IIndexer indexer) {
059    Context context = new Context(indexer);
060    IResult result = visitCatalog(catalogItem, context);
061
062    Catalog catalog = (Catalog) INodeItem.toValue(catalogItem);
063    result.applyTo(catalog);
064
065    catalogItem.modelItems().forEachOrdered(root -> {
066      root.getModelItemsByName(OscalModelConstants.QNAME_METADATA).stream()
067          .map(child -> (IAssemblyNodeItem) child)
068          .forEachOrdered(child -> {
069            assert child != null;
070            visitMetadata(child, context);
071          });
072
073      root.getModelItemsByName(OscalModelConstants.QNAME_BACK_MATTER).stream()
074          .map(child -> (IAssemblyNodeItem) child)
075          .forEachOrdered(child -> {
076            assert child != null;
077            visitBackMatter(child, context);
078          });
079    });
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  protected DefaultResult newDefaultResult(Context state) {
084    return new DefaultResult();
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  protected DefaultResult aggregateResults(DefaultResult first, DefaultResult second, Context state) {
089    return first.append(ObjectUtils.notNull(second));
090  }
091
092  protected void visitMetadata(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem metadataItem, Context context) {
093    Metadata metadata = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((Metadata) metadataItem.getValue());
094
095    IIndexer index = context.getIndexer();
096    // prune roles, parties, and locations
097    // keep entries with prop name:keep and any referenced
098    for (IEntityItem entity : IIndexer.getUnreferencedEntitiesAsStream(index.getEntitiesByItemType(ItemType.ROLE))
099        .collect(Collectors.toList())) {
100      Role role = entity.getInstanceValue();
101      if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
102        LOGGER.atDebug().log("Removing role '{}'", role.getId());
103      }
104      metadata.removeRole(role);
105      index.removeItem(entity);
106    }
107
108    for (IEntityItem entity : IIndexer.getUnreferencedEntitiesAsStream(index.getEntitiesByItemType(ItemType.PARTY))
109        .collect(Collectors.toList())) {
110      Party party = entity.getInstanceValue();
111      if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
112        LOGGER.atDebug().log("Removing party '{}'", party.getUuid());
113      }
114      metadata.removeParty(party);
115      index.removeItem(entity);
116    }
117
118    for (IEntityItem entity : IIndexer.getUnreferencedEntitiesAsStream(index.getEntitiesByItemType(ItemType.LOCATION))
119        .collect(Collectors.toList())) {
120      Location location = entity.getInstanceValue();
121      if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
122        LOGGER.atDebug().log("Removing location '{}'", location.getUuid());
123      }
124      metadata.removeLocation(location);
125      index.removeItem(entity);
126    }
127  }
128
129  @SuppressWarnings("static-method")
130  private void visitBackMatter(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem backMatterItem, Context context) {
131    BackMatter backMatter = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((BackMatter) backMatterItem.getValue());
132
133    IIndexer index = context.getIndexer();
134    for (IEntityItem entity : IIndexer.getUnreferencedEntitiesAsStream(index.getEntitiesByItemType(ItemType.RESOURCE))
135        .collect(Collectors.toList())) {
136      Resource resource = entity.getInstanceValue();
137      if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
138        LOGGER.atDebug().log("Removing resource '{}'", resource.getUuid());
139      }
140      backMatter.removeResource(resource);
141      index.removeItem(entity);
142    }
143  }
144
145  @Override
146  public DefaultResult visitGroup(
147      IAssemblyNodeItem item,
148      DefaultResult childResult,
149      Context context) {
150    CatalogGroup group = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((CatalogGroup) item.getValue());
151
152    IIndexer index = context.getIndexer();
153    String groupId = group.getId();
154    DefaultResult retval = new DefaultResult();
155    if (SelectionStatus.SELECTED.equals(index.getSelectionStatus(item))) {
156      if (groupId != null) {
157        // this group should always be found in the index
158        IEntityItem entity = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(index.getEntity(ItemType.GROUP, groupId, false));
159        // update the id
160        group.setId(entity.getIdentifier());
161      }
162      childResult.applyTo(group);
163    } else {
164      retval.removeGroup(group);
165      retval.appendPromoted(ObjectUtils.notNull(childResult));
166
167      if (groupId != null) {
168        // this group should always be found in the index
169        IEntityItem entity = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(index.getEntity(ItemType.GROUP, groupId, false));
170        index.removeItem(entity);
171      }
172
173      // remove any associated parts from the index
174      removePartsFromIndex(item, index);
175    }
176    return retval;
177  }
178
179  @Override
180  public DefaultResult visitControl(
181      IAssemblyNodeItem item,
182      DefaultResult childResult,
183      Context context) {
184    Control control = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((Control) item.getValue());
185    IIndexer index = context.getIndexer();
186    // this control should always be found in the index
187    IEntityItem entity = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
188        index.getEntity(ItemType.CONTROL, ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(control.getId()), false));
189
190    IAssemblyNodeItem parent = ObjectUtils.notNull(item.getParentContentNodeItem());
191    DefaultResult retval = new DefaultResult();
192    if (SelectionStatus.SELECTED.equals(index.getSelectionStatus(item))) {
193      // keep this control
194      // update the id
195      control.setId(entity.getIdentifier());
196
197      if (!SelectionStatus.SELECTED.equals(index.getSelectionStatus(parent))) {
198        // promote this control
199        retval.promoteControl(control);
200      }
201      childResult.applyTo(control);
202    } else {
203      // remove this control and promote any needed children
204
205      if (SelectionStatus.SELECTED.equals(index.getSelectionStatus(parent))) {
206        retval.removeControl(control);
207      }
208      retval.appendPromoted(ObjectUtils.notNull(childResult));
209      index.removeItem(entity);
210
211      // remove any associated parts from the index
212      removePartsFromIndex(item, index);
213    }
214    return retval;
215  }
216
217  protected static void removePartsFromIndex(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem groupOrControlItem,
218      @NonNull IIndexer index) {
219    CHILD_PART_METAPATH.evaluate(groupOrControlItem).stream()
220        .map(item -> (IAssemblyNodeItem) item)
221        .forEachOrdered(partItem -> {
222          ControlPart part = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((ControlPart) partItem.getValue());
223          String id = part.getId();
224          if (id != null) {
225            IEntityItem entity = index.getEntity(IEntityItem.ItemType.PART, id);
226            if (entity != null) {
227              index.removeItem(entity);
228            }
229          }
230        });
231  }
232
233  @Override
234  protected DefaultResult visitParameter(IAssemblyNodeItem item, IAssemblyNodeItem parent,
235      Context context) {
236    Parameter param = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull((Parameter) item.getValue());
237    IIndexer index = context.getIndexer();
238    // this parameter should always be found in the index
239    IEntityItem entity = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
240        index.getEntity(ItemType.PARAMETER, ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(param.getId()), false));
241
242    DefaultResult retval = new DefaultResult();
243    if (IIndexer.isReferencedEntity(entity)) {
244      // keep the parameter
245      // update the id
246      param.setId(entity.getIdentifier());
247
248      // a parameter is selected if it has a reference count greater than 0
249      index.setSelectionStatus(item, SelectionStatus.SELECTED);
250
251      // promote this parameter
252      if (SelectionStatus.UNSELECTED.equals(index.getSelectionStatus(parent))) {
253        retval.promoteParameter(param);
254      }
255    } else {
256      // don't keep the parameter
257      if (SelectionStatus.SELECTED.equals(index.getSelectionStatus(parent))) {
258        retval.removeParameter(param);
259      }
260      index.removeItem(entity);
261    }
262    return retval;
263  }
264
265  protected static final class Context {
266
267    @NonNull
268    private final IIndexer indexer;
269
270    private Context(@NonNull IIndexer indexer) {
271      this.indexer = indexer;
272    }
273
274    @NonNull
275    @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "EI_EXPOSE_REP", justification = "provides intentional access to index state")
276    public IIndexer getIndexer() {
277      return indexer;
278    }
279  }
280}
